suggestion: Add static properties and auto-injection method to WBBaseComponent constructor. After super() call, add: if (!WBBaseComponent._globalEventLogInitialized) { WBBaseComponent._initializeGlobalEventLog(); }

Add these static methods to WBBaseComponent: _initializeGlobalEventLog() - creates and injects wb-event-log, getGlobalEventLog() - returns the global instance, toggleEventLogVisibility() - toggles display for debugging
Add at class level: static _globalEventLogInitialized = false; and static _globalEventLog = null; to track initialization state

Before appendChild in _initializeGlobalEventLog(), check if <wb-event-log> already exists in DOM to prevent duplicates: const existing = document.querySelector('wb-event-log'); if (existing) { WBBaseComponent._globalEventLog = existing; return; }
